questions.q: Can I re-join if I exited earlier?
questions.a:
Yes! If you quit with a Diploma/Degree, you can re-enter.
Requirement: You must clear 'Re-admission Final Exams' (e.g., MAD2, PDSA for Diploma holders) to continue. Fee: ₹5000 per exam.

questions.q: Can I do this with another degree?
questions.a: Yes, UGC allows dual degrees. You can pursue this online while doing a regular BTech/BSc/BA on-campus.

questions.q: What is the SCT for OPPE?
questions.a: System Compatibility Test (SCT). It is MANDATORY. You must pass this test (usually a simple check of your camera, mic, and environment) before the actual OPPE. If you miss SCT, you will NOT be allowed to write the OPPE.

questions.q: Do Mock Tests give extra marks?
questions.a: Bonus: If Avg of Mocks >= 40/100, you can get up to 2 bonus marks in some courses. Check course grading doc.

questions.q: What happens if I miss a Quiz?
questions.a: If you miss one Quiz, the other Quiz score is usually considered with a penalty or specific formula adjustment. If you miss BOTH quizzes, you are ineligible for the End Term.

questions.q: Can I change my Exam City?
questions.a: You select preferences before every term. Strict Rule: You must report ONLY to the assigned center. Unauthorized center entry is strictly prohibited.

questions.q: How do I become an Alumnus?
questions.a: Complete the BSc (114 credits) or BS (142 credits) requirements. You MUST register with IITMAA.
₹7080 (one-time). Paid in two installments (50% in first Degree term, 50% in next). Includes Alumni Card and lifetime IITMAA membership.

1. Campus Access: Entry to IITM, Library, Gymkhana, Swimming Pool.
2. Guest House: Booking privileges at Taramani Guest House.
3. Networking: Access to Job Portal, Mentorship, and Global Chapters.

Complete the BS Degree (142 credits) with a CGPA > 8.0. You can then register for the PG Diploma level (20 credits).

Students with CGPA >= 8.0 (Campus) or via GATE can apply for MS (Research) at IITM.
New: 'Project Staff' route also available (CGPA >= 7.5 in 2 campus courses).
You can credit 'Comprehensive Exam' courses (Level 4) if you are in the top 1% of GATE-DA or GATE-CS papers.

questions.q: Do I need a powerful laptop?
questions.a: Not really. A basic laptop with 4GB+ RAM is enough. However, a working webcam and microphone are mandatory for proctored exams and some sessions.
